snippet: Researchers who have had papers retracted give their side of the story.
abstract: Dr Naoki Mori, cancer researcher who has had 30 papers retracted by scientific journals, contends that the misconduct in question was superficial and did not diminish the core conclusions of his work; Mori's defense is rare in the scientific world, where researchers rarely respond after their work is retracted.
lead_paragraph: Researchers who have had papers retracted give their side of the story.

headline.seo: After Retractions, Scientists Try to Explain Themselves
headline.main: After Mistakes, Scientists Try to Explain Themselves
headline.print_headline: After Mistakes, Scientists Try to Explain Themselves
